lead_paragraph: The owner and the vice president of the firm admitted they had not paid prevailing wages to more than 300 people employed on various projects.
snippet: The owner and the vice president of the firm admitted they had not paid prevailing wages to more than 300 people employed on various projects.

headline.main: M.T.A. Contractor Pleads Guilty to Underpaying Workers
headline.seo: M.T.A. Contractor Guilty of Underpaying Workers
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Contractor Pleads Guilty to Underpaying Workers
